chart_ruler: CHART RULER — WHO’S DIRECTING THE SCENE → Your chart ruler is the ruling planet of your Ascendant sign. Its sign and house show how your storyline unfolds and who’s directing the vibe behind the scenes. Below are the chart rulers in each sign, decoding how your character arc flows:
chart_ruler_houses: CHART RULER IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOUR STORY UNFOLDS → The house shows where the story unfolds. Below, each house takes on a unique aesthetic depending on its sign — aka, the set design of your cosmic stage.

houses_in_signs: HOUSES IN THE SIGNS — SET DESIGN FOR YOUR COSMIC STAGE → The house shows where the story unfolds. But the sign on the cusp tells us with what style. Below, each house takes on a unique aesthetic depending on its sign — aka, the set design of your cosmic stage.
